attributes.action: Tackling Homophobic Bullying In School & Workplace.Educating Staff &Training Pupil Mentors.
attributes.additional_details:
Schools should have clear policies on Homophobic Bullying,They should deal with incidents swiftly,Provide Help & Support,Equip 7 Educate staff,Broaden the Curriculum,Have Pupil Mentors Trained..Raise Awareness of Self Injury among Teens...Staying safe online(CYBERBULLYING)
pUTTING POLICY INTO PRACTICE.
